00056         void Track(bool a_active, int a_xPosition, int a_yPosition)
00057         {
00058                 if (a_active)
00059                 {
00060                         if (!m_tracking)
00061                         {
00062                                 m_tracking = true;
00063                         }
00064                         else if (m_tracking)
00065                         {
00066                                 float xDelta = (float)((a_xPosition - m_xPosition) * 0.01f);
00067                                 float yDelta = (float)((a_yPosition - m_yPosition) * 0.01f);
00068 
00069                                 //D3DXVECTOR3 position = m_camera->GetNode()->GetPos() + D3DXVECTOR3(xDelta, yDelta, 0.0f);
00070                                 //m_camera->GetNode()->SetPos(position);
00071                                 //D3DXVECTOR3 up(0.0f, 1.0f, 0.0f);
00072                                 //m_camera->RotateGlobal(up, xDelta);
00073 
00074                                 //D3DXVECTOR3 across(1.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f);
00075                                 //m_camera->Rotate(across, yDelta);
00076                                 m_camera->Handle(xDelta, yDelta);
00077                         }
00078 
00079                         m_xPosition = a_xPosition;
00080                         m_yPosition = a_yPosition;
00081                 }
00082                 else if (!a_active)
00083                 {
00084                         if (m_tracking)
00085                         {
00086                                 StopTracking();
00087                         }
00088                         else {
00089                         }
00090                 }
00091         }
